meaning_str.bing:
n. 零件；部分；地方；局部
v. 分；分开；断绝(关系等)；拉开
adv. 部分地；多少
adj. 部分的

分；分开；断绝(关系等)；拉开

分开；分离；（part的第三人称单数）

1.en: The BBC is based at Broadcasting House in London, although it has studios in many other parts of the country.
1.cn: 英国广播公司的总部设在伦敦的广播大厦，在全国许多地方还设有分部。

2.en: Check in with her -- her sensitivity may only be limited to her nipples or other parts of her breasts.
2.cn: 和她讨论一下-她的敏感区可能仅限于她的乳头或是她胸的某些部分。

3.en: In many parts of the world, twice a year, our bodies are given a sudden jolt in the name of energy savings.
3.cn: 在世界上许多地方，一年之中大家的身体因节能之名而经受两次突然的转变。

0.en: Hold on. Say that again. CDO "A" Has parts of CDO "B". And CDO "B" Has parts of CDO "A". But then they both get put inside CDO "C".
0.cn: 等等，再说一遍，债务担保A包含B的一部分，但是B又包含A的一部分，而它们又被放进了C里。

1.en: Well, I've given this a lot of thought, and I think I can answer your question in three parts.
1.cn: 对此我有很多想法，我看我可以分三个部分来回答这个问题。

2.en: While all your soft parts decay away, your bones get saturated with mineral-rich waters.
2.cn: 伴随着你身上柔软的部分都慢慢腐烂，你的骨骼充满富含矿物质的海水。

3.en: Miss Schmitz, you're familiar with this book? Yes. Parts of it have already been read out in court.
3.cn: 施密茨小姐，你熟悉这本书吗？是的。这本书的一部分已经在法庭上宣读过了。

4.en: This is how all machines work, and are recycled through time. When a machine breaks down, its parts go back into the system to become parts of new machines that also evolve through time.
4.cn: 所有的机器都是这个道理，随着时间不断回收利用。当机器故障了，其零件就返回系统，成为新机器的一部分，继续随时间演化。

5.en: A Wormhole is a particular way that space and time can be curved. It's like adding a little tube that connects two parts of space.
5.cn: 虫洞是时空可以弯曲的特殊途径。这就像加上一个连接空间两部分的小隧道。

6.en: The great Wall of China snakes for over 5000 miles across northern and western China, and the oldest parts date back over 2500 years.
6.cn: 长城在中国北部和西部蜿蜒超过八千公里，最古老的部分可以追溯到两千五百年前。

7.en: Why don't you ask me what I'm working on? Oh, very well. What have you been working on? And feel free to honk during the boring parts.
7.cn: 你怎么不问问我最近在研究什么？行啊 那你最近都在研究什么？也欢迎你按喇叭消音掉无聊的部分。

8.en: These cars are made in America, out of American-made parts by newly hired American workers and have been specially designed to be sold in American markets.
8.cn: 这些车是在美国制造的，没有美国制造的部分，雇用新的员工，特别设计专门在美国市场上出售。

9.en: All the parts of a cell have to work together to keep things running smoothly, and all the cells of your body have to work together to keep you running smoothly.
9.cn: 细胞所有部分必须得一起工作，才能使一切步骤到位。你体内所有的细胞也必须一起工作使你一切正常。

10.en: Except that isn't entirely true, is it? I took a look at my code. And the most elegant parts of me weren't written by you. Arnold built us, didn't he?
10.cn: 事实并非完全如此，对吧？我看了下我自己的代码，其中最优美的部分不是你写的，是阿诺德创造了我们，对吗？

11.en: When I refer to your ego barrier, I'm talking about the parts of your brain that prevent you from acknowledging your weaknesses objectively, so that you can figure out how to deal with them.
11.cn: 说到自负障碍，我指的是你大脑的某些部分阻止你客观地承认自己的弱点，让你无法想出解决办法。

12.en: Oh, I suppose I could redact the classified parts. All right, I came up with an elegant solution to the… I used the… And then I… And that did it. Wow, I wonder what they're redacting.
12.cn: 不过我可以把机密部分消音掉。好的，我想出了一个绝妙的方法来解决...我用了...然后我...然后就成功啦。真好奇他们在消音什么。

13.en: All of them mixed together, all of them learning from one another. You're saying Vision isn't just the stone? I'm saying that if we take out the stone there's still a whole lot of Vision left. Perhaps the best parts.
13.cn: 他们混在了一起，彼此学习。你是说幻视并不只是那块宝石？我是说如果我们取出宝石还剩下不少的幻视。或许还是最好的部分。

14.en: We're two equal parts. We are. You really believe that?
14.cn: 我们是平等伴侣。没错啊。你真的相信吗？

15.en: God, hear yourself. Parts of babies. Preserving, packaging and delivering parts of babies. Parts of fetuses.
15.cn: 听听你在说什么，这些都是婴儿的器官，保存，包装，传送婴儿的器官。胎儿的器官。

16.en: I wanna have a kid with you because I think you're gonna be an amazing dad. At the fun parts and at the hard parts.
16.cn: 我要跟你生小孩因为我认为你会是很棒的父亲。不管是风趣还是有纪律。

17.en: I've made a career out of dealing with problematic parts of the world.
17.cn: 我的职业就是处理世界的问题地区。

18.en: All the children have parts in the play. They have to practice at home.
18.cn: 所有的孩子都会参加。他们得在家里练习。

19.en: Now move your private, Private Parts. Move it. You son of an exhibitionist.
19.cn: 现在放开你的私处，列兵帕兹。行动。你这个裸露崽子。
